summary: An example script that demonstrates how to train a transformer model with tensor parallelism using Lightning Fabric. It sets up a random token dataset, configures model arguments, parallelizes the model across devices with a ModelParallelStrategy, and runs a training loop leveraging distributed loss computation.
business_intent: Provide developers with a reference implementation for scalable, distributed training of large language models, illustrating the integration of Lightning Fabric, tensor parallelism, and loss parallel techniques.
